items.text: poor, poor running. Driven past the diving cover fielder. There was never a second, but they still decided to chance one. Excellent work from the wide long-off fielder who charged in and released the ball in a jiffy at the correct end. The throw to Mushfiqur wasn't all that accurate, but Mushfiqur did well to take it on the full and then lunge towards the stumps and break it airborne. Masakadza was miles short and Zimbabwe have lost a third. Outstanding glovework. Brain freeze from the batsman. Imrul having a dream day, he can do no wrong.
items.shortText: Nazmul Islam to Masakadza, 1 run, OUT

dismissal.text: H Masakadza run out (Imrul Kayes/†Mushfiqur Rahim) 21 (34b 1x4 0x6) SR: 61.76
